issue.title: [Python] Add sort_by method to Array, StructArray and ChunkedArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14656](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14656). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be convenient to be able to sort a `StructArray` on one of its columns. This can be done by combining multiple compute functions, but having a helper that does that for you would probably be better.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14656?focusedCommentId=17441691) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
This would probably be more useful as a C++ addition.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14656?focusedCommentId=17441697) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Ah, now I see the PR, I understand. I thought you wanted to sort the entire structarray (all the columns).
